attributes.action: Protect purchasers from fraudulent private vehicle sales
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To protect buyers, who have no other choice than to purchase vehicles privately, from sellers who misdescribe, withold information about faults and sell to unsuspecting consumers for a price that is over value of vehicle - especially those in an unsatisfactory condition. 
At present buyers can part with hundreds of pounds to find that once the money has been handed over that faults have been disguised and therefore causing more expense to the majority who cannot afford to lose such large sums of money to basic daylight robbery. 
Guarantees and Statements of truth from sellers to verify that the car is in such condition to warrant asking price and to note full refund in event this is not so. Fines to sellers who are uncooperative.
